programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective»It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards) S1 (11/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards»Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington the Detective) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Paddington the Detective»DAN Drainpipe Dan is stealing Mrs. Brown's wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison) S3 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La course rigolote) S3 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La course rigolote»Papa Cochon participe à une course afin de récolter des fonds pour réparer le toit de l'école. Lorsqu'une guêpe le poursuit, son allure augmente de belle façon...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (The Bubble Bee-athlon) S3 (15/26)
programme.desc: «The Bubble Bee-athlon»Bzzzz! The Guppies are busy living the bees' life! Turning nectar into honey is tough bzzness. It takes a lot of teamwork every step of the way. Can the kids work together to make honey for the queen bee's teatime?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La crise de rire de Magenta) S3 (n°15)
programme.desc: «La crise de rire de Magenta»Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one "patient" seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête des lumières avec Blue) S3 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La fête des lumières avec Blue»Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special guest coming to our party! Who could it be?

programme.title: Santiago des mers (L'histoire des deux Tomás) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «L'histoire des deux Tomás»It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Silver Lasso) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Silver Lasso»Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié»Fort Fin-ship: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. (S2, ep 1a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Best Friends Game) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Best Friends Game»The Best Friends Game: When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up. (S1, ep 26b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le gâteau de Jake / Skier comme un pro) S4 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Le gâteau de Jake / Skier comme un pro»Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Hotel Paddington) S2 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Hotel Paddington»Paddington's Pet Hotel: Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. (S2, ep 24a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de sport) S2 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de sport»C'est jour de fête à la garderie et de nombreuses animations ont été organisées pour l'occasion. Papa Pig enseigne à Peppa que l'important n'est pas de gagner mais de participer...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le garage de Papy Dog) S2 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Le garage de Papy Dog»It is amazing what Grandpa Dog provides everyone within his garage. And fortunately, otherwise you have bad luck with your bad luck as a breakdown! But when something goes wrong with the new car wash, Papa Pig suddenly turns out to be the great savior.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en montgolfière) S2 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en montgolfière»Peppa and her family are at the school fête. The top prize in the raffle is a trip in a Hot Air Balloon. Peppa wins! Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb into the balloon. Everyone enjoys the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Shooting Star) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Shooting Star»Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Circus Celebration) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Circus Celebration»Bubu's DVD of his favourite circus show does not work. So the others create their own circus acts in the backyard instead. (S1, ep 14).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La chanson de Blue) S1 (8/17)
programme.desc: «La chanson de Blue»Josh wants to find out which song Blue would like to sing and of course Blue's Clues offers a solution.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une soirée pyjama avec Blue) S1 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Une soirée pyjama avec Blue»It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La ferme en folie) S8 (16/24)
programme.desc: «La ferme en folie»Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse: Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans. (S8, ep 16b).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs»Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots) S1 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots»A meteor hits Earth and Mister Steel's heroic demeanor forces Deer Squad to save everyone. A dance competition in Middenbos turns into a mess.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge) S1 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge»Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié»Fort Fin-ship: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. (S2, ep 1a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le portrait de Bubu) S1 (56/78)
programme.desc: «Le portrait de Bubu»Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a gift. She leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher discovers the abandoned painting.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Paperplane Race) S1 (n°44)
programme.desc: «The Paperplane Race»Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Great Friendship Show) S1 (n°34)
programme.desc: «The Great Friendship Show»Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Remember-ator) S1 (n°35)
programme.desc: «The Remember-ator»Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Georges attrape un rhume) S2 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Georges attrape un rhume»Peppa wins a ride in Miss Rabbit's hot air balloon and the whole family comes along. Peppa drops Teddy and Papa Pig saves him. But if they get stuck in a tree, who will come and save them?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'examen de la vue) S2 (16/52)
programme.desc: «L'examen de la vue»Comme Pedro son ami porte des lunettes, Peppa pense qu'elle en a besoin elle-aussi. Maman Pig l'emmène alors chez l'occuliste pour vérifier sa vue...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bureau de papa Pig) S2 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Le bureau de papa Pig»Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig's job is... complicated. Peppa and George have a go at each job. They love working at Daddy's office.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and her friends on a boat trip to pirate island to dig for treasure. Ahhhh ... while they are building a sand castle Grandpa fell asleep on the boat and drifted away ... What now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La poterie) S3 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La poterie»Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'incroyable Chacrobate) S6 (n°3)
programme.desc: «L'incroyable Chacrobate»When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Big Rig to the Rescue!) S6 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Big Rig to the Rescue!»When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Alex et sa Mini Patrouille / Alex a perdu sa dent) S3 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Alex et sa Mini Patrouille / Alex a perdu sa dent»Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol and recruits Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. But when their actions attract the attention of a hungry eagle, Alex has to rescue his own team. // Alex loses his first tooth... then really loses it. He can't find it anywhere! The Paw Patrol is hot on the tooth's trail, and everyone is determined to find it before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Danny X le Hardi / Chien robot le dépanneur) S3 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Danny X le Hardi / Chien robot le dépanneur»When a boy named Danny sees Ryder perform an incredible stunt during a rescue, it inspires him to become a daredevil. When Danny attempts a risky stunt, Ryder and the pups use the Air Patroller for a daring mid-air rescue! // Ryder entrusts the care of Adventure Bay to Robo-Dog while he and the Pups take a well-deserved break. But Robo-Dog goes on a fixing rampage, and Ryder and the Pups must cut their vacation short to save him!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal»After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (The Big Bug Hunt) S2 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Big Bug Hunt»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective»It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards) S1 (11/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards»Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vacances en camping-car) S3 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vacances en camping-car»La famille de Peppa décide d'aller à CanardLand, un parc dans lequel ils peuvent observer les canards. Ils sont surpris lorsque leur camping-car se transforme en bateau...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le compost) S3 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Le compost»Peppa et George déposent des épluchures de légumes sur le compost de grand-père. Les vers les transforment en engrais que Mamie et Papy utilisent pour leurs plantes...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison) S3 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La course rigolote) S3 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La course rigolote»Papa Cochon participe à une course afin de récolter des fonds pour réparer le toit de l'école. Lorsqu'une guêpe le poursuit, son allure augmente de belle façon...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (The Bubble Bee-athlon) S3 (15/26)
programme.desc: «The Bubble Bee-athlon»Bzzzz! The Guppies are busy living the bees' life! Turning nectar into honey is tough bzzness. It takes a lot of teamwork every step of the way. Can the kids work together to make honey for the queen bee's teatime?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La crise de rire de Magenta) S3 (n°15)
programme.desc: «La crise de rire de Magenta»Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one "patient" seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête des lumières avec Blue) S3 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La fête des lumières avec Blue»Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special guest coming to our party! Who could it be?

programme.title: Santiago des mers (L'histoire des deux Tomás) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «L'histoire des deux Tomás»It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Silver Lasso) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Silver Lasso»Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié»Fort Fin-ship: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. (S2, ep 1a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Best Friends Game) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Best Friends Game»The Best Friends Game: When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up. (S1, ep 26b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le gâteau de Jake / Skier comme un pro) S4 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Le gâteau de Jake / Skier comme un pro»Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Hotel Paddington) S2 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Hotel Paddington»Paddington's Pet Hotel: Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. (S2, ep 24a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Chez le dentiste) S2 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Chez le dentiste»Peppa has been to the dentist before, but for George it is the first time. And that's scary.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue»Grandpa Big made a train! He is sure that it is the strongest little train in the world, but Grandpa Hond thinks that is nonsense. Until Miss Rabbit's bus gets stuck in the mud.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit train de Papy Pig) S2 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit train de Papy Pig»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Very Busy Afternoon) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «A Very Busy Afternoon»A Very Busy Afternoon: Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, (S1, ep 17).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Four-Leaf Clover) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «The Four-Leaf Clover»The Four-Leaf Clover: Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her! Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win. (S1, ep 18).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La grande fête de Blue) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La grande fête de Blue»Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur»Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel "borrows" water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf»Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets) S1 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets»Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Snow Dream) S1 (n°60)
programme.desc: «Snow Dream»Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Maître Christophe) S1 (47/78)
programme.desc: «Maître Christophe»Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubble Trouble) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Bubble Trouble»Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Party Time) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Party Time»Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The Gift Box: The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. But he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift. (S1, ep 78).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Une rencontre mystérieuse) S1 (65/78)
programme.desc: «Une rencontre mystérieuse»Mysterious Visitor: Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. (S1, ep 65).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le sentier de randonnée) S2 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le sentier de randonnée»Suzie Sheep comes to play at Peppa's, together with her invisible friend Leo de Leeuw. Peppa has to get used to it, but soon she is playing Suzie's game, just like Papa and Mama Pig. Only George finds it difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami imaginaire) S2 (37/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami imaginaire»Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa. Suzy has made up a pretend friend called "Leo Lion". Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy announces that Leo likes roaring and he likes playing dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along with the game. But Peppa's little brother George cannot see Leo and feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»Peppa and George want to go to the playground with Papa and Mama Pig. But a fog sets in and they get lost. When Papa Pig thinks they are back home, the fog clears and they are... in the playground!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Tous à la piscine) S2 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Tous à la piscine»Peppa and George learn to swim, just like Kelly and Karel Konijn. And that swimming is fun through all your life, Papa Pig shows.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sire Blaze et la licorne) S6 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Sire Blaze et la licorne»Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Derby Dino) S6 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Derby Dino»Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le shampoing volumateur / La machine à rétrécir) S4 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Le shampoing volumateur / La machine à rétrécir»The Kit-trastrophe crew get into the poufy shampoo and blow away. // Marshall dreams he gets shrunk.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une chatte citadine / Du surf en plein ciel) S4 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Une chatte citadine / Du surf en plein ciel»Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique»Mr. Steel wants to go to the moon and orders Professor Sketch to turn the Steel Tower into a rocket! A magician lures the audience away from Rammy's presentation, who gets so angry that he takes it out on the man's hat.
